attributes.action: Stop Premier League clubs from playing an extra match at  venues scattered across the globe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
following proposals to add an additional game to the league season, to be played abroad.

It will only benefit the 'big' clubs and only financially, it has NOTHING to do with improving football, or even the image of the game and has EVERYTHING to do with greed and taking the game away from the fans who have kept these clubs afloat for many many years.

so please help us stop our game being being diluted into a circus

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
